original_text: I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations and disperse them through the countries.
korean_text: 애굽 사람을 뭇 나라 가운데로 흩으며 뭇 백성 가운데로 헤칠지라

sentences.original_text: I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 애굽 사람들을 열방 가운데 흩으리라

sentences.original_text: and disperse them through the countries
